skill.name: smart-bug-fix
skill.description: Intelligent bug fixing workflow combining root cause analysis, multi-model reasoning, Codex auto-fix, and comprehensive testing. Uses RCA agent, Codex iteration, and validation to systematically fix bugs.
skill.summary: Intelligent bug fixing workflow combining root cause analysis, multi-model reasoning, Codex auto-fix...
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: This skill is a pure specification document defining a debugging workflow. It contains no executable code, no network calls, no filesystem access, and no external command execution. All referenced capabilities (RCA, Codex fixing, testing) are documented behaviors that require explicit user invocation through Claude Code's tool system.

content.user_title: Debug bugs with root cause analysis
content.value_statement: Debugging complex bugs wastes hours of developer time. This skill uses systematic root cause analysis, multi-model reasoning, and automated testing to identify and fix bugs faster with validated solutions.
actual_capabilities: Performs deep root cause analysis using 5 Whys methodology
Generates multiple fix approaches using multi-model reasoning
Implements fixes using Codex with sandbox isolation
Runs comprehensive test suites with up to 5 iterations
Validates fixes for regressions and performance impact
Produces detailed analysis reports and change documentation
limitations: Requires a directory or file path with bug context
Cannot fix bugs in compiled binaries or closed-source libraries
Limited to 5 Codex fix iterations before escalation
Performance analysis requires before/after measurement capability

use_cases.title: Debug production issues
use_cases.description: Systematically debug production bugs with full root cause analysis and validated fixes

use_cases.title: Automated bug fixes
use_cases.description: Automatically fix failing tests with regression validation and multiple fix attempts

use_cases.title: Incident response
use_cases.description: Quickly diagnose and fix deployment failures with comprehensive impact analysis

prompt_templates.title: With reproduction steps
prompt_templates.prompt: Fix this bug: [DESCRIPTION]. Steps to reproduce: [STEPS]. Error logs: [LOGS]. Code location: [PATH]

prompt_templates.title: Complex debugging
prompt_templates.prompt: Debug this complex issue: [DESCRIPTION]. This appears to be [INTERMITTENT/RACE CONDITION]. Context: [PATH]. Logs: [LOGS]

prompt_templates.title: Full analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the full smart-bug-fix workflow: Bug description: [DESCRIPTION]. Reproduction: [STEPS]. Error: [ERROR]. Context path: [PATH]. Depth: deep. Include performance impact analysis.

output_examples.input: Fix the login timeout bug in src/auth/ when users try to log in with valid credentials during peak hours
output: Root Cause: Database connection pool exhaustion under concurrent load
Fix Applied: Increased pool size and added connection timeout handling
Validation: All 47 tests passed with no regressions
Performance: 12% increase in throughput under peak load

best_practices: Provide error logs and reproduction steps for faster diagnosis
Use deep analysis mode for complex or intermittent bugs
Review generated alternatives before applying fixes
Always run regression tests after applying automated fixes
anti_patterns: Running without providing any context or error information
Applying fixes without reviewing the root cause analysis
Using for bugs in code you do not have permission to modify
Skipping validation steps for production-critical systems

faq.question: Which AI models does this skill use?
faq.answer: Claude for root cause analysis and validation, Codex for fix implementation, Gemini for large codebase context when needed.

faq.question: What is the maximum fix iteration limit?
faq.answer: Codex will attempt up to 5 fix iterations. If all fail, the issue is escalated to the user for manual intervention.

faq.question: How does it integrate with my codebase?
faq.answer: Provide a directory or file path as context. The skill analyzes your code structure, dependencies, and error patterns.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. Codex runs with network disabled in sandbox mode. Your code is only processed locally and never sent to external services.

faq.question: What if tests still fail after iterations?
faq.answer: The skill escalates to the user with a detailed report of attempts made. You can then apply manual fixes or adjust the bug description.

faq.question: How is this different from manual debugging?
faq.answer: This skill automates the systematic debugging process with multiple AI models, iteration testing, and comprehensive validation that would take hours manually.
